General.Name: Yeong Hwa Meta
General.Description: Yeong Hwa Metal Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive casting products in South Korea. The company offers exhaust manifolds, cylinder blocks, and crank shafts. It also provides wheel hubs, and diff cases and carriers, brake discs and drums. In addition, the company offers mission carriers, oil pump housings, and pressure plates; and turbine and beaning housings. Yeong Hwa Metal Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is based in Changwon, South Korea.
